system.description:
Racial Traits

  • Island elves have Islakawa as their native language, and receive Trade Bant Simplified as a secondary language.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • Island elves have a base Combat Point score of 16.
  • Island elves CHP formula is CON Score.

Physical Description

A healthy island elf typically stands between 4’-5’, and weighs between 80-120 lbs. The men are usually slightly taller than the women. Island elves have slightly pointed ears. Island elven skin tone ranges from a dark tan to a deep dark tone, and their hair ranges from dark brown to a black, and can be straight or curly, depending on the particular island elf. The average elven lifespan is 160 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 20-27. Island elves almost always have intricate tattoos as well, that can range in size and intricacy from one person to the next.

Language

The native language of an island elf is Islakawa.

Names

Island elves can have anywhere from three to five names, the first few names denoting their birth location such as an island or country, then their family name and finally their personal identifying name. This name is usually in Islakawa.
